attributes.action: Close the green lane mosque in birmingham.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
After watching the channel 4 dispatches program regarding green lane mosque in birmingham I am utterly appauled that we allow these messages of hate to be delivered in our own country. I ask all citizens who feel the same to sign this petetion to try to get our
so called prime minister to do something about this utterly unacceptable situation!

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
